title: Numenera Collection Part 1
description:
The complete list of all the Numenera books and resources updated through 08/28/13:

-Cypher Deck
-GM Screen
-Map of the Ninth World
-Numenera Core Rulebook
-Numenera Player's Guide
-Tales from the Ninth World
-The Nightmare Switch
-XP Deck

plus, Terrain PDFs from the Kickstarter project.

-----------------

Numenera is a science fantasy roleplaying game set in the far distant future. Humanity lives amid the remnants of eight great civilizations that have risen and fallen on Earth. These are the people of the Ninth World. This new world is filled with remnants of all the former worlds: bits of nanotechnology, the dataweb threaded among still-orbiting satellites,  bio-engineered creatures, and myriad strange and wondrous devices. These remnants have become known as the numenera.

Player characters explore this world of mystery and danger to find these leftover artifacts of the past, not to dwell upon the old ways, but to help forge their new destinies, utilizing the so-called Ã¢â‚¬Å“magicÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ of the past to create a promising future.

-----------------

This game was created and successfully kickstarted by Monte Cook. If you like the contents of this torrent, please seed. If you love it, please support Monte Cook Games and grab a copy of the Core Rulebook that's already in physical print, and other books when they too get printed. 
Keep your eyes peeled for more content from them in the months and years to come.

Support independent creators!
